talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Chatterbox Book Doctor$
I'm going to give youtoday's knowledge!
This is the luck if you buy a lottery.
Ah…I misunderstood. This is about today's knowledge. I'm sorry.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Can't hear anything) I will find good magic spell books to improve me.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Tamara$
Just forget about the meeting at Riverwart Village Ruins with the guy and take a peaceful rest with my pies.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oops! …I I want to eat something suddenly!! (Let's run away)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Tamara$
It will help you refresh your feelings and improve your spell power.
How about it? Doesn't it look delicious? (it smells so bad and weird)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh~ what did you say? Ah, suddenly I can't hear you~</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Tamara$
Then take out these and have them on lunch.
I made a lot~

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086172>Quest Accepted</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Necessary Condition$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What? Didn't you make it normally?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Tamara$
(Tamara's murmuring in a low tone)
If you don't eat this right now, the magic is released and then the ingredients will run away ….

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You don't have any good magic spell books?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Tamara$
I, I roasted it! But during roasting pies something was popping up and I spelled magic involuntarily. It's like seasoning~ ahahaha.
(Suddenly she change the topic.) By the way, being strong is not only from good magic spell books.

$Chatterbox Book Doctor$
Ahem.
I feel ominous today so I don't receive any questions.

$Master Sorceress Tamara$
Well… Ah! Karacule's bookcan be good advice for you!
It looks just normal but it's from Karacule. So It may contain a lot of knowledge.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Chatterbox Book Doctor$
Today, I'm not going to get any questions.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Shorty?! (Calm down)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Chatterbox Book Doctor$
It feels like it's not going to be beneficial to me today. My instinct is so sensitive.
As soon as I saw you shorty! …I realized it would be better to take a nap than listening to you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I'd rather talk) Don't you know a strong magic spell book?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Chatterbox Book Doctor$
I'm the Karacule's PRE.CI.OUS BOOK Doctor.
You should be careful when treating me as you know.
Watch out! Don't touch it!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well, then you make me stronger!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Chatterbox Book Doctor$
Strong magic spell book? Hmm… Are there any that kind of strong book here except me?
Humhum. You just directly came to me so you must have an eye for books.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I don't feel anything) What did you do?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Chatterbox Book Doctor$
Strong?
…wind..make it!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I can see some dust on the left corner of the book)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Chatterbox Book Doctor$
Blessing. There are only few people who got my blessing. Don't be touched.
Anyway get out of here. It feels ominous.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I press the left corner of the book.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Chatterbox Book Doctor$
(Its face turns blue and read.)
W..Wait!! There…!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I should be strong. Give me advice how to be strong.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Chatterbox Book Doctor$
Ahh!! (Doctor screams because of the titillation feeling) Ahhh~ Hweee~ Haaaaa~
Don't do this! Don't you know me? I'm the book of Karacule!!
You're ruining me~!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I tear off some corner of the book)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Chatterbox Book Doctor$
F, First… go to the library! And then read books about liberal arts… and then expand your sights….Ahhhhh!!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh~ now we're talking</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Chatterbox Book Doctor$
Ahhh no!!!! The… The Greatest Book! In the
Ancient Library!
That's it! That's all! There's no need to read liberal arts books!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Can't hear anything) Yes! I'm going to take it.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Chatterbox Book Doctor$
But the book is…

$Chatterbox Book Doctor$
(On the corner of the empty page of Doctor, some words are being written)
But the book is only for the ancients. You should read all the pages.
(Doctor's closing itself)

$Chatterbox Book Doctor$
So the Greatest Book is in the Ancient Library…
(Listen! Hear me out!)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I made fire on my hands) There wasn't… the book?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Chatterbox Book Doctor$
Wait! (Doctor is scared of her)
I know why you turned back here.
Books are for reading not for tearing off.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Didn't you hear me?! The book is… gone!!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Chatterbox Book Doctor$
W..Wait!!!
I'm so vulnerable the fire!
Stop! Are you going to burn me out?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>(Receive Reward)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Talk with Master Sorceress Tamara
journal.contents:
Talk with Master Sorceress Tamara

Lotus Marsh → Master Sorceress Tamara

journal.title: Talk with Chatterbox Book Doctor
journal.contents:
Talk with Chatterbox Book Doctor in the cabin of Karacule.

Riverwart Wharf(Karacule's cabin) → Chatterbox Book Doctor

journal.title: Searching Ancient Library
journal.contents:
Search Ancient Library to find the Greatest Book.

Riverwart Wharf(Ancient Warehouse Entrance) → Ancient Library
journal.todo_msg: Search Ancient Library to find the Greatest Book

journal.title: Talk with Chatterbox Book Doctor
journal.contents:
I couldn't find the Greatest Book. Let's get back to Chatterbox Book Doctor.

Riverwart Wharf(Karacule's cabin) → Chatterbox Book Doctor
journal.todo_msg: I couldn't find the Greatest Book. Let's get back to Chatterbox Book Doctor.
